data.title: Harris County Clerk's Office
data.text:
For customers interested in purchasing electronic files of records filed with the County Clerkâ€™s Office, both index and image data are available by date range. The index data we provide is generated from the information in the source documents and are text (.txt) files that are pipe delimited for ease when importing into a variety of programs. The image data we provide are TIFF (.tiff) files and available for most of the documents recorded in the County Clerk's office. Both forms of data are purchased separately and are available in any custom date range delivered on CD or DVD, or customer provided hard drive. Additionally, we offer FTP access which provides daily data, purchased monthly, of most of the records in the County Clerk's office.

For additional information, contact the Data Sales desk by navigating to our and selecting 'Data Sales'. Or by phone at 713-274-6390.
